residuals

Source: R/FLQuant.R
residuals-FLQuant.Rd

residuals

# S4 method for FLQuant
residuals(object, fit, type = "log", ...)

Examples

data(ple4)
fit <- rlnorm(1, log(catch(ple4)), 0.1)
residuals(catch(ple4), fit)
